title: ICE officer accused of excessive force, then sent back to work despite active probe
description: DHS's handling of the incident raises questions about the department's oversight mechanisms to investigate employee misconduct.
content: DHS's handling of the incident raises questions about the department's oversight mechanisms to investigate employee misconduct.
